Message: The user completes the submission of the form
I installed my pixel on my shopify theme.liquid template but it did not pass the test

It sounds like there might be an issue with the pixel installation on your Shopify store. Let's go through the steps to ensure everything is set up correctly. 
1. First, make sure you've copied the correct base code from NewsBreak Ad Manager under Tools > Event Management.
2. Double-check that you've pasted this code into the correct section of your theme.liquid template.
3. After installation, test the pixel integration using NewsBreak Ad Manager's Event Tracking Tool by inputting your landing page URL and triggering a conversion event.
If you need more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). 
Let me know if you need further assistance!
